scripts.test:dev: CORTEX_API_URL=http://localhost:3001 pulumi env run npm-test npm run test
scripts.test:prod: pulumi env run npm-test npm run test
scripts.test:fast:dev: CORTEX_API_URL=http://localhost:3001 pulumi env run npm-test npm run test:fast
scripts.test:fast:prod: pulumi env run npm-test npm run test:fast
scripts.test:indexers:dev: CORTEX_API_URL=http://localhost:3001 pulumi env run npm-test vitest indexers.test.ts
scripts.test:scraping:dev: RUN_SCRAPER_TESTS=true CORTEX_API_URL=https://api-dev.cortexclick.com pulumi env run npm-test vitest scraping.test.ts
scripts.test:scraping:prod: RUN_SCRAPER_TESTS=true CORTEX_API_URL=https://api.cortexclick.com pulumi env run npm-test vitest scraping.test.ts
